p: Mollusks and crustaceans also appear to be interesting in this area. Data demonstrated that the aqueous extract of garden snail ( Helix aspersa) has antitumor activity against breast cancer cell line H5578T inducing necrosis; besides, it is a potent stimulator for TNF-α and a good inhibitor for NF-κβ, PTEN and p53 factors that regulate tumor development [ 76]. Table 1 compiled the previously mentioned examples of terrestrial animal anticancer by-products.
